channel.title: Blog on Oliver Wehrens
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Oliver Wehrens

item.title: One year of blogging
item.description: One year ago I started to blog again. Time for a little recap. Why did I do it ? I use this blog to write down my own thoughts about software and development. This is for my own reference but also it is a little way to give something back to the world wide community in return for all the useful stuff I do read on the net. I noticed how this also made me a better programmer.
